scripts.db:migrate: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node-pg-migrate up -f database.json -m database/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:up: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node-pg-migrate up -f database.json -m database/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:down: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node-pg-migrate down -f database.json -m database/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:create: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node-pg-migrate create -f database.json -m database/migrations
